data.name: Legend of Kendor
data.detailed_description:
Legend of Kendor is a Fantasy Free-Roaming Action Adventure Roguelike game.

You can explore different biomes and gather powerful items and weapons as one of the four heroes in Kendor. The great wizard's spell protects the fallen heroes until all the lost come back. Because the spell is imbalanced, every time heroes rise, everything will be changed. Level up, enchant your weapon, make alliances, and find powerful items to be strong. Can they save all their loved ones with your help?

Game Features:
  • Over 100 hours of gameplay
  • 100+ items and weapons
  • 10+ Adorable puppies and cats
  • 20+ Killable NPC with own consequences
  • Dragons and monsters with dynamic AI
  • Many many secrets and monsters
  • Dynamic game difficulty
  • and more hidden secrets
  • Hidden Playable Character
  • Story Explaining Tutorial Stage
  • Rebindable key setting
  • Controller Support
  • Smooth Pixel graphic with 60 FPS
  • No Meta progression
  • Sound Effect by Niilo Takalainen
  • Addictive game music written by ModalModule
  • Passionate and supportive developer

Planned Features

  • Local CO-OP up to 2 Players with Friendly Fire!
  • Unlocks and Achievements
  • Steam Leaderboard
  • Faction System
  • More hidden playable characters
  • More Items and Weapons


Legend of Kendor is Heavily inspired
by Nuclear Throne and many other same genre games.

data.short_description: Legend of Kendor is a Fantasy Free-Roaming Action Adventure Roguelike game. This is about people in Kendor trying to save their loved ones. You make your own path and adventure with consequences.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i5
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
